body: White worshipness is pretty strong on this series it’s fascinating and also creepy
That actually sounds fascinating, Feuerteufel. I highly doubt anyone will translate them, and I can't read Japanese ;_;

For all of you who are confused, this the adaption of one of the best literary masterpieces of nippons history. Its racist as fuck but also give a deep insight into the slain post-WW2 soul/spirit of yamato and about the disintegration that followed later up until today.
